        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </a></div><div style="clear:both;"></div></div><div><sup>Sponsored</sup></div></div><div class="cell show-for-medium medium-6" style="padding: 0.6rem;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="8442" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="8442" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.90</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="15082">15,082</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1087"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Acqua di Gioia</b> by <b>Giorgio Armani</b> is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women. <b>Acqua di Gioia</b> was launched in 2010. Acqua di Gioia was created by Loc Dong, Anne Flipo and Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Amalfi Lemon and Mint; middle note is Water Jasmine; base notes are Virginia Cedar, Brown sugar and French labdanum. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Acqua di Gioia is a new fragrance by Giorgio Armani, presented in March 2010. Seductive sea aromas in the new fragrance are put into first plan and used as creators' inspiration. Composition of the perfume is compared with woman who is ''strong, dignified and free spirit but in perfect harmony with nature''.
</p>

<p>Inspired by several summer holidays spent on the islands of Pantelleria and Antigua, where Armani has his villas, the fragrance was lead by the idea of escape into nature, a heavenly place of real holiday where we restore the energy necessary to body and soul, and where we create natural balance. 
</p>

<p>Its flacon was made as a natural shape – water drops which are clear, airy, and pellucid.
</p>

<p>The fragrance arrives on the market in June 2010 as a blend of refreshing notes of crushed mint leaves and lemon Limone Primo Fiore Femminello from Calabria. Structure of the composition pushes the limits from fresh citruses to a floral heart which encompasses aquatic jasmine, dewy peony and pink pepper, while a base closes with cedar, yellow sugar and labdanum. Acqua di Gioia was created by three perfumers: Loc Dong, Anne Flipo and Dominique Ropion, who see it as Eve's seduction and as fragrance turned completely towards the nature.
</p>

<p>The perfume can be purchased as 30, 50 and 100 ml EDP, along with 200 ml body lotion.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other                     It does not last long, with some individuals reporting that it vanishes after only a few hours.
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    The fragrance may smell familiar or like a scent associated with travel.
                </div>

                    </div>

                    Citrus top notes can be routine and unremarkable.
                </div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="8442"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.77.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lemon-77.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amalfi Lemon</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.160.jpg" style="width: 4.85rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mint-160.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mint</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94590744661054; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 3.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Water Jasmine</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.85008085084786; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 3.025rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Virginia Cedar</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.7475514178297; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.521.jpg" style="width: 2.55rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Brown-Sugar-521.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Brown sugar</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.15.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Labdanum-15.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>French labdanum</div></div></div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2348912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348912" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eeezee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179087"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2179087.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eeezee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Blue-Sapphire-82808.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82808.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blue Sapphire"title="Blue Sapphire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179087">Eeezee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fresh, feminine aquatic fragrance that is both salty and floral, which is less common than the strictly floral or the overtly sweet vanilla fragrances that are dominating right now. <br />
<br />
I'm familiar with masculine aquatics which are ubiquitous due to their inoffensive, fresh nature. But a squarely feminine fragrance with a citrus opening, a salty heart, a crisp green accord, and freshness that lingers on clothes and skin? What's not to like? Unlike many feminine scents that can be too sweet and inappropriate for warm weather, this one is clean and refreshing.<br />
<br />
I love this perfume on my wife, and delight being in her scent bubble when she wears it. It's perfect for spring and summer days when you want to feel light and airy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2348912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2348912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347344" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alicen1derland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1245282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alicen1derland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Casablanca-42181.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42181.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Casablanca"title="Casablanca"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245282">Alicen1derland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 03:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening feels quite strong to me, it's very green, citrusy, and a bit heavy. Which does not come across as fresh, and it's not really my taste. Thankfully, it softens after a while, holding onto its green and citrus notes but becoming softer and fresher. It’s well-loved by many and seems appealing to both men and women. I was once told it smelled "intoxicating."<br />
<br />
This fragrance is versatile and suits various occasions, day or night. Personally, I like wearing it in summer when I want a change, though it takes on a different feel in cooler weather. Ultimately, it depends on what type of scent you enjoy. It has good projection and lasting power.<br />
<br />
Acqua Di Gioia has been compared to Mayar Natural Intense, though their openings differ. I find both too harsh initially, especially Mayar, which leans almost peppery, and thankfully it disappears. But once they settle, they smell surprisingly similar, like sisters. After an hour, ADG stays bright and fresh, while MNI reveals sandalwood and base notes, giving it a slightly creamier, softer finish.<br />
<br />
Overall, I do like this fragrance, but I don't find myself reaching for it often. And it's not something I'd repurchase. <br />
<br />
Rating: 7/10<br />
Sillage: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 7/10<br />
<br />
Here’s a surprisingly delicious layering combo to try. Wear Acqua Di Gioia underneath Choco Musk. Together it's a creamy, sexy scent that’s reminiscent of a Creamsicle but with a bit of a sophisticated twist. My daughter’s been wearing these together, and she smells absolutely amazing. The scent is almost mouth-watering! Everyone loves it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2347344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2347344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339959" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="twistedsunshin3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1815392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="twistedsunshin3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815392">twistedsunshin3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 11:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love at first sniff! The moment I smelled it on a decant I knew I'd get a full size bottle. I finally found an inoffensive scent that smells fresh, but not too citrusy, salty and NO vanilla on it. I love vanillas and I wanted to add lighter scents on my collection when it's a hot and humid weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2339959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2339959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338880" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lemisha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251501"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lemisha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Le-Parfum-78427.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78427.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Le Parfum"title="Black Opium Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625091">doya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 02:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this in any season, but especially during colder months as the citruses kinda go backstage and mint gets more prominent to my nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2332242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2332242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2330573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1669317">Hifza</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 00:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another best one in my fragrance collection, all my heart for woody aromatic and green fragrances, cannot ever reject them! It's light, soft but soo good. Gorgeous, gorgeous and gorgeous!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2329848"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2329848#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327886" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 23:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells good. Clean and smooth.<br />
Shines at first, when some of that citrus is still alive.<br />
<br />
The dry-down leans shampoo-y;<br />
Vague and note-less, yet distinctly commercial.<br />
This aspect reminds me of the Floral Street DNA, which I'm not a big fan of.<br />
<br />
VERDICT: Inoffensive, and easy to wear. Also a little dated, and obnoxiously feminine. Very department store.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2327886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2327886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327308" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jetpet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589301"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1589301.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jetpet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/9-PM-Rebel-99238.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99238.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="9 PM Rebel"title="9 PM Rebel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327308ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327308" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589301">jetpet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 10:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was nose blind to aquatics for many years. To me, it was just another generic fragrance smell. However, one day I could suddenly detect the lightness, freshness, and woodiness, that define aquatics as well as the nuanced differences between brands.<br />
<br />
Acqua di Gioia is a beautifully done fragrance that has more longevity than most aquatics - especially on clothing. It also has a floral touch that leans feminine although I'm sure it would be suitable for men as well.<br />
<br />
If you're a fan of aquatics - be sure to test this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2327308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2327308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327108" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venussiandehermes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2107198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venussiandehermes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198">venussiandehermes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 07:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While I was walking around the stores with my sister, I found myself in the perfume section as always. My sister always complains about me trying perfumes all the time. 😂 I made my poor sister wait for minutes and she got really bored because perfumes don't interest her at all. Finally she gave up and I made her smell a few perfumes. It was last August and the weather was very hot. I claimed that some fresh perfumes can have a refreshing effect on people. And I made her smell this perfume. I don't know if she liked it or because I really didn't spend minutes there, she said, you can buy me a gift if you want. It worked. I bought it and we went out. 😂 <br />
<br />
I saw my sister wearing this fragrance a few times. Maybe she liked it. As for me, I love this fragrance. It has a very fresh and airy scent. It has the indispensable white floral notes and a little woodiness in women's perfumes. It suits a polite lady very well, I think it is a fragrance she can wear in any condition in the summer months.  My sister said that the longevity is neither good nor bad. <br />
<br />
I can easily recommend it to all women as a male preference. In fact, it has such a fresh and relaxing scent that sometimes I even think of wearing it myself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2327108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2327108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Would love some more complexity to the scent as well. However, as a fan of fresh scents I think this one is just very classic and lovely</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2320058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2320058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A must have. It is well blended, balanced, sweet and feminine.  You can't go wrong with this.  This shines very well n day and summer, but can be used in other ocasions for its balanced quality</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2319452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2319452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315767" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zahra68akbari"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zahra68akbari" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315767ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315767" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137326">Zahra68akbari</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 15:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So refreshing and clean</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2315767"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2315767#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="neonaya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/779895"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.779895.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="neonaya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Woman-by-Ralph-Lauren-45741.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45741.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woman by Ralph Lauren"title="Woman by Ralph Lauren"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/779895">neonaya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 13:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Iconic scent that is fresh enough, soft enough, sweet and energizing enough. For me it is green tea with bergamot slices that stand on the table next to watermelon plate. In the Cafe located near the ocean early in the morning. Beautiful 😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2304902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2304902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303010" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303010" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JaneBond"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556412"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1556412.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JaneBond" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303010ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303010" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556412">JaneBond</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 19:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Category: Fresh, citrusy, aquatic floral<br />
<br />
Notes: Lemon, lemon and lemon. Citrusy as all hell with an aquatic floral undertone. Initially it's very hard to pick out any individual notes other than lemon. After some time this turns a little leathery on me which makes it feel more masculine, but after about 5-6 hours it settles in a really lovely and feminine aquatic floral.<br />
<br />
Vibe: Blue lagoon. Caribbean waters. Lotus flowers and lily pads. White, flowy dress. Waterfalls. Rain. Diamonds and crystals. Fresh-out-the-shower but better. Water nymph. Poise. Elegance.<br />
<br />
Sillage: 9/10. Loud, but not offensive. I think because of its fraicheur. Anything I'd normally rate a 9 would be a no-go for me because I find it head-ache inducing but this one is totally wearable.<br />
<br />
Longevity: 8.5/10. Fantastic longevity on this one. Will definitely last you a full day. Passes the 24-hour test!<br />
<br />
Wear: Day or night, all year round. Definitely would consider this a spring and summer scent though because of how fresh it is. Perfect for a day on the beach, sailing or surfing or maybe even a visit to the aquarium as it has an aquatic feel to it.<br />
<br />
Overall rating: 7/10. Very fresh and invigorating, this smells like a cocktail of citrus and mild aquatic florals. It does lean just a tad masculine in my opinion, but not to the point where I would consider it a male fragrance. Unisex, leaning feminine, but could definitely work on a man! It does take several hours for the slightly masculine undertone to go away, but when it finally does this is a light, feminine and fresh floral scent. I really like this, but I'm not personally all that crazy about "fresh" scents and don't think the long wait for it to end up where *I* want it is worth the trouble. That being said, my mom tried this on at the same time as me and it smells absolutely incredible on her. She also has the skin type to "eat" fragrances and yet this managed to hold up really well without ever becoming loud or obnoxious. Definitely the right perfume, just not the right one for me.<br />
<br />
Who would wear it?: Bedelia Du Maurier in Hannibal. Grace Kelly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2303010"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2303010#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296471" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nathalia maria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2268087"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2268087.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nathalia maria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2268087">Nathalia maria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 23:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Não é um perfume ruim, na verdade ele tem um cheiro muito confortável, limpo e fresco.<br />
Porém, na minha pele ele fica muito rente. Tem que grudar em mim pra sentir o cheiro kkk<br />
Depois 1h-2h ele quase desaparece em mim, então eu não compraria de novo, mais valeu a experiência na época paguei 250 no frasco menor em uma promoção da Sephora.<br />
Para as pessoas que não gostam de chegar com um perfume muito evasivo Acqua e uma excelente opção.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2296471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2296471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A scent memory of someone I used to be. <br />
<br />
Clean, watery, with a surprisingly insistent base that soaks deep into my skin and lasts for hours. I don't get mint directly, but it might just amplify the overall "fresh" impression? Pulls more androgynous on me which I love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2286546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2286546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255279" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="infiniteambrose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2219245.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="infiniteambrose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255279ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255279" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254189" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zaira_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zaira_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cacharel/Eden-244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eden"title="Eden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212126">Zaira_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 10:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfect fragrance for me, which holds its special place. Beautiful real lemon and mint essence, freshness and cleansiness themselves. It's the personification of the crisp summer day spirit, and inhaling it has an immediate uplifting "vibrational" effect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2254189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2254189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843458">Suigintou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 08:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't expect to like this this much as I have a cheaper supposed dupe of this and I didn't like that one at all. Guess it's just a bad dupe :D This smells so nice and fresh, to the point I got thirsty and had to take glass of water lol. And now I also want to drink a mojito. However something is holding me back from getting a full bottle. This isn't feminine enough for me I guess? I don't know why but I expected it to be a little more feminine. Oh well. But I'm glad to have finally tried this out<br />
<br />
Oh! Also if anybody wonders if this is similar to Ocean di gioia (I did) I'd say imagine Ocean di gioia without that shampooey feel and replace it with mint and you get Acqua di gioia. Personally I prefer Ocean di gioia over this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2235709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2235709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231819" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marshallmiller23!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marshallmiller23!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705240">Marshallmiller23!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 09:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is a beautiful aquatic citrus. I get a lovely slightly powdery lemon.  I don't pick up lemon cleaner vibes at all, or any mint. The water jasmine adds to the clean, aquatic, and freshness of the fragrance. So beautiful and floral. A hint of sweetness from the brown sugar and a gorgeous slight vanilla tone. The cedar and labdanum truly ground and give this fragrance a bit of depth. Keeps it from being a basic lemon scent. The fragrance doesn't change from opening to dry down. But I'm okay with that as it's so beautiful to my nose. Not a beast mode, but moderate projection and sillage. Great price on discounters, so I can overspray as much as I like, lol. So happy to have recently add to my collection. 8.5 out of 10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2231819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2231819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223345" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sprayme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270839"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sprayme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270839">sprayme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this scent is great for humid extreme summer heat. it is fresh and a little floral and amazing. loved wearing it in the sopping heat. the scent itself is great, but i did not know how well it held up to the very humid hot weather in the south, in the usa. i was even spraying it in the room to be able to walk in to it when i returned to the room.    interesting how scent changes with the weather around it. i bought this last summer but didnt think much of it, until recently. it doesnt make me naucious like some summer scents can. it’s beautiful and gentle and effective. now im interested in the other variations, especially the pink one and the blue one. dont know why i cant just be happy i discovered a good scent. always reaching for more. why?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Other perfumes tend to be too much for some people, so I can feel self-conscious about wearing too-strong scents. this perfume is very nice but slightly unremarkable. this is probably up there on my list for my next new scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220199" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thewizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1510071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thewizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lanvin/Eclat-d-Arpege-988.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.988.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclat d’Arpège"title="Eclat d’Arpège"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1510071">Thewizard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 09:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's not bad but smells like a cleaning product</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2220199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2220199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 19:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Usually I like Armani’s fragrances but this Air di Gioia is very underwhelming to say the least. It’s not a bad smelling scent in the slightest but it’s too faint, it’s performing like a cologne concentration on me.<br />
<br />
To give it credit, I think this would be just the right scent for hot, humid and sticky days with temperatures around and above 40 Celsius degrees. For such occasions will be just the right intensity and not too fleeting.<br />
<br />
It would be a great, inoffensive summer citrusy, floral, freshie for the rest of the climate if they would increase the oil concentration to a true EDP. And for the price, don’t even bother. There are better lemony/mint/jasmine forward scents and way cheaper than Air di Gioia in my opinion!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2214718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2214718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203810" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mira97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1684370.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mira97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Herba-Fresca-60.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Herba Fresca"title="Aqua Allegoria Herba Fresca"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203810ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203810" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684370">Mira97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-30">06/30/24 07:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's perfect for hot weather</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2203810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2203810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196467" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="supergirl9412"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078670"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1078670.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="supergirl9412" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078670">supergirl9412</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Acqua di Gioia opens bright and solar with a nice citrus note (a mix of lemon and grapefruit to my nose). The heart and drydown feature a clean but overwhelming floral note. After looking at the pyramid, I am SHOCKED that it’s jasmine and not lotus! Regardless, the detergenty floral is definitely the star of the show. A distant cousin to D&amp;G Light Blue. <br />
<br />
Not crazy in projection, but it’s quite strong in my scent cloud. Moderate longevity.<br />
<br />
Overall, this feels like cool winds and a clear, blue sky. Even though this should be an easy pick for hot summer weather, the floral note is a bit much, so I’ll be saving this for cooler spring days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2196467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2196467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195092" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="booksandcats457"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447947"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="booksandcats457" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Good-Girl-Blush-78576.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78576.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Good Girl Blush"title="Good Girl Blush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447947">booksandcats457</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice year-round daytime scent. It’s not super strong so I’d feel comfortable wearing it in an office or other professional setting. (I recently wore this for a job interview, actually!) It matches the description pretty well - it’s a clean, slightly soapy, feminine aquatic. Not too complex but nice and simple and classic. Doesn’t seem to last the longest - a few hours at most - so I take the travel spray with me and reapply.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2195092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2195092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190558" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
