padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463">Aquapinkmoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 00:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So refreshing and clean, smells like expensive resort spa products, a holiday by the water, 5 star drinks and dinners and luxury.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2190558"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2190558#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188064" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lbustos2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2055934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lbustos2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Princess-90174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Princess"title="Princess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055934">Lbustos2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In my opinion, this perfume is such a beast mode. It permeates through every room. I’m not sure if others relate, but I do think this perfume is such a good bang for your buck. You’ll smell it on yourself and others will be able to smell it too. <br />
<br />
It smells like you’re going sailing on a Sunday morning. It’s so aquatic and pretty. This perfume is an ode to the ocean’s beauty and grace. I truly do think it’s such a precious, timeless, and young scent. I wouldn’t say it’s mature, but it’s good for a young woman in her late teens or early 20s. It smells so gentle, aquatic, and mesmerizing. I can picture mermaids wearing this. Like in the movie Aquamarine where Sarah Paxton is wearing blue head to toe and puts the talking starfish on as earrings. I can definitely sense that Aquamarine was an Acqua do Gioia girl. Beautiful scent. Encore!!!!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2188064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2188064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185091" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DonChako"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1636444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1636444.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DonChako" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormaie/Papier-Carbone-52505.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52505.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Papier Carbone"title="Papier Carbone"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1636444">DonChako</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like Y edp &amp; Adidas CHRG. 👍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2185091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2185091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179687" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="athpolitou"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687098"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1687098.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="athpolitou" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6458.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bal d'Afrique"title="Bal d'Afrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687098">athpolitou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 01:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have seen a lot of people rave about this scent, and how many compliments they receive wearing it. I have sampled it twice, trying to see what they're talking about but I was left underwhelmed both times. It just smells generic to my nose. It's your standard fresh citrusy/fruity scent with not much character or anything setting it apart from the fragrances of its kind. In fact Is it bad? Certainly not. I would expect something more refined from Armani, I am pretty sure I can find something similar to this at ZARA for a fraction of the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2179687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2179687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158603" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="noodlehead19"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1277444.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="noodlehead19" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Coco-Vanille-42782.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42782.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Vanille"title="Coco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158603ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158603" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277444">noodlehead19</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 22:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>lemonade with fresh mint leaves, served on a patio at a chic brunch spot. as the note pyramid would suggest, the stars of the show here are lemon and mint. to my nose, the mint is always there, even as the lemon fades into some beachy, almost salty white floral. I don't get much of the brown sugar at all, but I'm not mad about that; part of me feels like it might not mesh well with the other fresher notes. gives the vibe of someone effortlessly put together, like the 'coastal grandma' aesthetic. my own, very not-coastal grandma gave it her stamp of approval, so I guess that counts for something, too. perfect for summer days and perhaps could make a great gym fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It smelled amazing at first and I gradually fell out of love with it. It slightly reminds me of Burberry Her EDT since they're both very clean smelling, but this is Hers popular older sister who's a lifeguard at the community pool. Not a fan of the bottle but that doesn't really matter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2153765"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2153765#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152033" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mata-ratos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1711237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1711237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mata-ratos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Molecule-01-845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Molecule 01"title="Molecule 01"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1711237">Mata-ratos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, aquatic, tangy, fresh, salty, floral, shower-fresh. This smells like being on vacation in a beach-side hotel, windows are open, and your sister just stepped out of the shower leaving a scent trail of the cleanest, prettiest, shampoo you’ve ever smelled coming from her dripping wet hair. There’s a tiny bit of mint that adds a freshness and I smell a bit of tangy saltiness from the lemon (though this isn’t a “lemony” scent)<br />
This scent is very similar to Ocean di Gioia, but this one has more of a tanginess to it and doesn’t have the same level of indolic white florals that Ocean has. Though they are a bit different, I think if I were to smell either on someone passing by I wouldn’t notice the difference.<br />
<br />
Moderate sillage and great longevity. I can still smell this 8 hours after spraying it on! I like that this is a clean scent that others will notice rather than the 90% of clean scents that disappear within 30 minutes.<br />
<br />
My fiancé says he really likes this scent and he likes it more than Ocean. I think I do, too.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2152033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2152033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2150752" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sappho&#039;s tea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2127026"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2127026.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sappho&#039;s tea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/A-Drop-d-Issey-Essentielle-81420.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81420.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A Drop d'Issey Essentielle"title="A Drop d'Issey Essentielle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2150752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2150752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2127026">sappho&#039;s tea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-09">05/09/24 12:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>at first i really loved it but then i've smelled it during warmer weather and i've smelled cucumber which i don't really like in perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2149569" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shoegeezer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2112160"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2112160.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shoegeezer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-Summer-2021-65799.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65799.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One Summer 2021"title="CK One Summer 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2149569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2149569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2112160">Shoegeezer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 09:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>How lovely! Has a "harmonious" smell to it, if that makes sense. It doesn't knock my socks off, but if I smelled this on someone, I would think "They smell nice!"<br />
<br />
Clean, fresh, feminine. Definitely in my wheelhouse. I want to try more scents like this! I feel like this brings me closer to finding my ideal perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2149569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2149569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2134097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2134097" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ripgirl9000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625667"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1625667.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ripgirl9000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2134097ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2134097" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625667">ripgirl9000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a cool water fragrance, acqua is a fitting name. Very wet, refreshing, and fresh. I wouldn't have picked out lemon or mint, but now that I see those notes I notice that they are there. It is very well blended. 'Giorgio Armani Acqua' makes me feel like its a crisp, fresh and windy day on top of an Ireland cliff overlooking the ocean. While 'Giorgio Armani Ocean' is a warmer sandy salty beach with flowers blooming on the cliffs. I prefer the opening of Acqua but then prefer the dry down of Ocean. The bottles are all beautiful.<br />
<br />
I have Giorgio Armani Light, Ocean, Air and Acqua. Love them all but below are ranked. <br />
#1 Ocean: Salty ocean floral,<br />
#2 Light: Perfect Spring Creamy Floral<br />
#3 Acqua: Refreshing water and tea<br />
#4 Air: An earthy clean scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2134097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2134097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133149" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lovaloo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1209968.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lovaloo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mitsouko-Eau-de-Parfum-25316.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25316.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mitsouko Eau de Parfum"title="Mitsouko Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133149ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133149" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209968">Lovaloo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 17:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft, creamy lemon, aquatic with the cucumber-melon touch of calone. The mint is sweeter and more mild, not as aromatic as I expected. More of a cooling, abstract green impression, like wintergreen. The nondescript watercolor florals fade to clean musks and soft woods. The trail is cool, clean, refreshing.<br />
<br />
An anachronism in my mind. It smells like a lot of 90s releases. Aquatic notes and clean florals can impart an abrasive texture, but not here. The most impressive aspect of this perfume is how smooth it is. Very nice in the category of "clean girl" perfumes if the others are a bit too overused for your taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2133149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2133149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130414" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Treachaseff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1890111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Treachaseff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130414ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130414" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1890111">Treachaseff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 07:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the closest thing I have to a signature scent. I definitely perceive this as a light fragrance, but my husband can smell it in my clothes days later. Maybe unobtrusive is a better way to describe it. The mint and lemon in the opening are both sweetened, and together they give me the impression of a tangy tropical fruit--a sumptuous cousin to a passion fruit, or maybe a tart guava? It reminds me of a soursop fruit (guanabana) too. The water jasmine in this just may be my favorite interpretation of jasmine. And a lot of people say they don't notice the brown sugar, but I do. It sticks to the skin in a very subtle, sensual way and provides a sweet warmth that gives this more versatility than its summery contemporaries. This has year-round potential if you don't mind a light scent in winter. It's the only perfume I have a back up bottle of.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2130414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2130414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126919" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atomikbomb_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1211792.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atomikbomb_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126919ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126919" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792">Atomikbomb_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 19:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this, it's quite nice, but it's pretty thin, especially for an EDP. I kept checking to see if I hadn't accidentally gotten this confused with the EDT...but no, I'm reviewing the correct formula. <br />
<br />
It's beyond refreshing, honestly. It's *quenching* with that lemon and fresh mint. Because of it's very thin body, I do think this would be a fragrance to use if it's ever scorchingly hot, because it's one of the most cooling, yet lightly weighted perfumes (or even body mists) I've experienced. <br />
<br />
But it doesn't last long whatsoever, and it's exceedingly top-note dominant. After an hour or so, 80% of the experience is gone and you're left with a very light woody skin scent. I get absolutely 0 "sugar" or labdanum here, there's barely any base. <br />
<br />
This is easily unisex, there's nothing overtly femme (or masculine for that matter) here at all. <br />
<br />
I'll probably never purchase this unless it was available at a large discount, but it's really pleasant while it lasts.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2126919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2126919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122182" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ground hound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1589008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ground hound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olfactive-Studio/Iris-Shot-54869.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54869.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Shot"title="Iris Shot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008">Ground hound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-12">04/12/24 03:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, moderately fresh , moderately citrusy, moderately sweet.<br />
 I can't smell much mint, mostly citrus/lemon peel. <br />
A clean pleasant less generic freshie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2122182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2122182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120311" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hissingprig"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2090401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hissingprig" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090401">hissingprig</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 08:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i got a sample of this free with an ulta order and have been using it for 2 days; i noticed that, immediately after spraying this, it almost smells like i just wiped my kitchen counters and accidentally sprayed myself with some of the cleaner. however, i'm able to pick up on the jasmine, brown sugar, and a bit of cedar on the drydown. it's definitely more floral as it settles into my skin, which makes it perfect for spring. this perfume also makes me super nostalgic for getting out of my friend's pool in the summer as a child; i don't take this as a very mature scent. for that reason, i also believe this would be the perfect scent for a summertime party. the mint top note in this is very subtle and definitely smells more of a fresh mint leaf than, say, toothpaste or gum. overall, this is a really enjoyable fragrance! i'm still on the fence about whether i want a full bottle, though.<br />
<br />
this was my first review of a perfume ever so it isn't very technical but i hope it kind of makes sense!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2120311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2120311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120258" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I cannot smell any mint on my skin, such a shame. I am usually in love with jasmine scents, but can barely even make it out here. Even after dry down I don't smell anything other than lemon. I think Aqua Bella by La Rive is a lot better tbh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2120258"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2120258#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017803">sugarfawn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i think i need to start off by saying i don’t and probably will never like citrus/greenish perfumes. i tried this one because my mom has a bottle and i was bored<br />
<br />
that being said, the mint in the opening is very very powerful. and so is the lemon . it isnt possible to smell anything else for the first few minutes. as it dries down, it turns down the volume a bit and settles into a more woody, flowery scent. the lemon is still very much there but its less awful. i think it kind of smells like grass almost. i can definitely smell the jasmine and its kind of nice except it smells exactly like dish soap. <br />
its very very aquatic and gives me a headache. if you like that then yeah go for it i guess</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2110080"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2110080#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109830" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109830" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ThetideGoesWithme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2079008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ThetideGoesWithme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079008">ThetideGoesWithme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 09:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My ride or die. Nothing but love for this beautiful fresh scent.<br />
<br />
The lemon and mint open the scent which makes it smell not quite like either. A watery, clean, lightly floral experience, summer in a bottle. Sophisticated enough for a white table cloth dinner on the beach at a swanky resort, but fresh and light enough for everyday, especially summer. <br />
<br />
This scent is not loud, it is gorgeously light. Reminds me of a tray of fresh citrus served on a sailboat cruise in the Mediterranean at sunset. A mid-day reapplication may be necessary.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2109830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2109830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108783" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Morgan45"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650779"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Morgan45" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Paris-Corner/Khair-Pistachio-92766.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92766.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khair Pistachio"title="Khair Pistachio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650779">Morgan45</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 08:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice enough if you like a light, aquatic floral.  Unfortunately, aquatic scents are not my thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2108783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2108783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107504" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107504" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Anarig97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1930819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Anarig97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107504ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107504" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930819">Anarig97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 22:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was super disappointing. The actual scent of this perfume wasn’t offensive, even though I wasn’t that impressed with it either. I have reacted more positively to other citrus scents. However, the disappointment stems more from the longevity and sillage. Out of all the perfumes I have tested, this has the worst longevity yet. This completely disappeared after 1-2 hours and I feel like I sprayed a good enough amount over multiple areas of my body, including skin and clothes. Usually I’m not as critical of sillage on perfumes but with the pathetic longevity, good projection would have been nice, but that was nonexistent as well. It’s probably my own body chemistry that just doesn’t work well with this perfume but I will not be revisiting this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2107504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2107504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106555" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesu Bowa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262337"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1262337.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesu Bowa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262337">Chesu Bowa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 00:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Acqua di gioia is my signature scent, I’m running through my fifth bottle now. This fragrance is more aquatic than fresh in my opinion. It opens with a watery mint and fruity lemon. The lemon here isn’t bitter but fruity &amp; bright, while the mint isn’t strong or harsh it’s watery and soft. Then the dry down is a brown sugar vanilla magic with a  hint of cedar and you still get that damp mint picking through. This fragrance is pure ecstasy. 🍃 other ways to describe acqua: <br />
Sweet Mint tea. <br />
<br />
Brown sugar bag with a dozen mint crystals inside and a hint of lemon extract. <br />
<br />
if mint were a fruit, it would smell like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2106555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2106555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106124" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106124" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fangirleche"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664090"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1664090.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fangirleche" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Soft-Spot-93322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soft Spot"title="Soft Spot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106124ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106124" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664090">fangirleche</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a beautiful citrus! This smells very cool and refreshing. The mint and lemon are great together without being too screechy(imo), I can smell that brown sugar note in the dry down and it’s SO GOOD! It’s definitely a dumb reach fragrance for me, love it!<br />
<br />
Edit: this is not mind blowing, or unique, but it’s definitely one of my favorite designer freshies, I decluttered D&amp;G’s Light Blue after I received this, that is too screechy &amp; lemon cleaner like to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2106124"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2106124#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105031" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chicagogirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/700743"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.700743.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chicagogirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Amore-Caffe-87409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amore Caffè"title="Amore Caffè"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/700743">chicagogirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Basically a blind buy bc I forgot how this smelled after testing manyy years ago. I only got this bc it was half off in the Ulta sale, $35. I passed it up in prior sales when it was half off but for some reason this year I couldn't resist lol. I think this smells super generic. It's an aquatic citrus. At first there’s a beautiful burst of spearmint but it dissipates quickly. If you've ever owned or smelled a fragrance in that category before you'll know the vibe. If I owned Light Blue I wouldn't even bother with this. They smell different dont get me wrong but it's the same aquatic fresh citrus vibe. This does smell better than Light Blue to me so if you want to pick only one get this. It's a bit warmer and less harsh. This is the perfume you'd wear while relaxing in your room at a fancy resort hotel somewhere tropical. You're feeling the chill of the AC even though it's hot out so you are wearing a fancy cozy warm white robe. I love the bottle too, it's so elegant and the cap is so pretty and reminds me of their fancy Privè line. I'm so not an aquatic or fresh perfume girlie but I plan to wear this all of spring/summer. Wont repurchase tho even at $35.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2105031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2105031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104852" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caseykins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2037518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2037518.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caseykins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104852ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104852" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2037518">caseykins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent has a beachy, borderline musty note that makes my stomach churn. But if you’re into that musk, “fresh” smell you’ll like this. Aside from that it’s a pretty basic perfumey smell, like what you’d typically smell in the perfume section at a Macy’s. Wouldn’t say it’s a spring scent at all, leans more summer than anything.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2104852"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2104852#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104763" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Storm1980"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1886123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Storm1980" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); This scent is effortless to wear, not overly complex, and I can't imagine it would be offensive in an office setting. While I usually prefer gourmand fragrances, this aquatic scent has really impressed me. I just purchased a full bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2104763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2104763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2103134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2103134" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jesz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/286229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.286229.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jesz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2103134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2103134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/286229">jesz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-24">03/24/24 19:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's worth it to find an older bottle of this. The newer batch , of which I smelled samples of today (March 2024), was not as nice as one I found a few years ago. <br />
<br />
It doesn't seem to have that fluid sense of being there, subtly enhancing the atmosphere of the wearer, yet not overpowering them. <br />
<br />
This batch is more sharp, and has that empty, artificial disconnection of hairspray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2103134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2103134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2102085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's uplifting, clean and such an easy reach. I like to wear this on hotter days or fresh out of the shower. It's a little sweet, and I love the lemon mint opening.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2092779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2092779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2089437" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I am only getting the mint and jasmine, no citrus. Is it the sample or am I crazy?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2089437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2089437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081219" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042651">tealover_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-03">03/03/24 15:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume, its a very refreshing, light, clean and comfortable fregrance so its totally work/school friendly. The opening is statisfying, the lemon and mint notes, remind me of my favourite cold drink on a summer day mohito! After 1h-2h it dries down to a slightly sweet floral, its probably the jasmine with brown sugar combination, its a pleasant sweetness. The perfume is giving clean girl vibes and smells very natural, it fits very well for a spring/summer day and is totally worth the price for me, its a safe blind buy for fresh perfume enjoyers!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It's inoffensive, fresh and cheerful scent. Absolutely perfect for office and everyday, in late spring or summer. <br />
<br />
For me, it has a slightly soapy/shampoo scent, like you've got out of shower, and I like that kinda vibe in this perfume.<br />
<br />
Nothing surprising/unique or signature, thought, just a nice perfume most people will like/find inoffensive and fresh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2078778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2078778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931">PhantomBelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 08:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a good perfume for spring/summer, weekends, errands, any time you just need a fresh &amp; uplifting vibe. <br />
<br />
This is a very low-intensity perfume, it doesn't project or last too terribly long but for the price I think it's a keeper. If you want a quiet freshie, consider it. A great work/casual setting scent. <br />
<br />
Safe blind buy? If you like fresh aquatics and citruses, I would recommend it. Purchased from: Sephora</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2074583"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2074583#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't get the mint at all. It's more Lemon Pledge meets Windex with a floral/migraine-inducing dry down. Definitely not a safe blind buy for citrus fans.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="2070614"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=2070614#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
