padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/535118">AndreeaRadu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-27">07/27/23 23:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells great.. for 5 minutes. And I’m not exaggerating. I’ve been in a holiday in Turkey for a week in 40+ Celsius. I applied the perfume when getting out of the hotel… and in 5 min it was gone. I had 50 ml bottle and consumed more than half in an attempt for me to “smell of something” … nothing 😭just a waste of money and worse.. a holiday without a great scent .. luckily I had the Elizabeth Arden green tea cream with me and that helped a bit… won’t rebuy this perfume… worst reformulation ever</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1888708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1888708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1883973" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1883973" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lauraura"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735802"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lauraura" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1883973ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1883973" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735802">Lauraura</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-21">07/21/23 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The bottle is pretty, acqua di gioia opens with a strong citrus/mohito smell, i find this perfume to turn quite masculin on my skin, definately a unisex perfume, i prefer the beautiful ocean di gioia.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1883973"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1883973#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1882748" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1882748" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lasura"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586739"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1586739.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lasura" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Mon-Paris-38914.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38914.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Paris"title="Mon Paris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1882748ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1882748" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); Fresh in the beginning, mint note is gone in a second unfortunately, but aquatic feelings stays on pretty long. Pleasant, skin like finish, really nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1882748"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1882748#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881983" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="la_belle_duchesse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697407"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1697407.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="la_belle_duchesse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Very-Good-Girl-65560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Very Good Girl"title="Very Good Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881983ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881983" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697407">la_belle_duchesse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-19">07/19/23 04:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this! It's such a refreshing summer scent. I get the sweetness from the brown sugar note, which compliments the citrusy freshness of the fragrance well. Some people are comparing it to a mojito cocktail and I definitely get that vibe as well. A nicely balanced scent, one that I pick up a lot during those hot, summer days. I also think the bottle design is beautiful. 🍋🌿🍹The longevity is a bit lacking though and I usually have to reapply throughout the day. That is a bit unfortunate because I really enjoy the scent otherwise.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1881983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1881983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880033" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OloraGolosina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1786512.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OloraGolosina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786512">OloraGolosina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-16">07/16/23 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first blind buy, It is definitely a safe one, I feel that I have smelled this before; its name is very agreeable, there is a refreshing aquatic characteristic about it, it's reminiscent of warm rain in a tropical forest over water lilies and jasmine flowers; it's funny because I feel humidity whenever I wear it.  The smell is pleasant,  longevity on my skin is 4 hours before I have to reapply, projection is good, perhaps 1.5mt, for 2.5 hours and slowly diminishing until it becomes a skin scent, I would say it's ok plus, not a masterpiece, good for Spring/Summer, acceptable to wear in a work environment, cinema and many other  indoor activities.  I guess I am glad it wasn't boring or awful, I'll finish this bottle but I would not repurchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1880033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1880033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1879892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells niche</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1877650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1877650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1877449" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lisa86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791204"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lisa86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1877449ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1877449" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791204">Lisa86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 21:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This crisp green scent gives me confidence to feel powerful and in charge without being masculine. <br />
<br />
Why? Because it smells like MONEY.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1877449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1877449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877088" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1877088" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumelovere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumelovere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1877088ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1877088" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196236">perfumelovere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 11:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My signature scent when it first came out. I wore this for a few years and received countless compliments. The formula and composition is gorgeous and one of my all time favorite aquatics. Not sure what happened around 2015 timeframe but many perfumes became weak skin scents that only last a few hours with little to no scent bubble. There is a noticeable difference in concentration and quality from a 2013 bottle versus a 2023 bottle. I'm still not sure how these companies can advertise and charge for an EDP that has the strength of a high quality body spray. It's deceptive though because they are strong right out of the bottle and then after an hour can only be noticed when you put your nose up to your wrist. On the bright side you can spray a lot without worrying about offending anyone. That's the one thing I do appreciate about the emergence of perfumes that stay close to the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1877088"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1877088#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1872954" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HannahRosesAreRed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705684.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HannahRosesAreRed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Bubble-Bath-60105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bubble Bath"title="Bubble Bath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1872954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1872954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705684">HannahRosesAreRed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-06">07/06/23 17:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The ultimate summer citrus, right up there with rival Dolce &amp; Gabbana's Light Blue. Acqua Di Gioia is the ubiquitous fresh fragrance, a combination of clean, fruity lemon, aromatic, cooling mint, fresh, green cedar wood and just a touch a white floral for sweetness. The result is a refreshing, invigorating piquant scent, perfect for the worst heat and humidity. It's instantly invigorating and comforting. The opening is sharp but not screechy, and the drydown is appealingly soft and almost musky, but still retaining those aromatic and lemony notes. It's a beautiful fragrance that perfectly matches its lovely aqua-hued juice and mineral bottle design.<br />
<br />
BUT–it has one huge, fatal flaw. Its longevity. Or lack thereof. <br />
<br />
Like water on skin in dry desert heat, Acqua Di Gioia refreshes–but also vanishes. It disappears as quickly as it's sprayed. On my skin, it lasted an hour before it vanished without a trace. Granted, this isn't unusual for many fresh citrus fragrances of its kind, but it's truly a shame. So many of the other Di Gioias have this problem. For the price and for the quality of the scent itself, Acqua Di Gioia really should perform better than it does.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1872954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1872954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1871568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1871568" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="takema"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207499"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1207499.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="takema" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-Eau-de-Toilette-46273.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46273.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One Eau de Toilette"title="The One Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1871568ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1871568" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207499">takema</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-05">07/05/23 06:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a bottle of the older formulation (bottle with the round cap) and have had a couple samples of the more recent formulation. I didn't notice any significant differences in performance and smell. I didn't try them side by side though. I really enjoyed the samples, but was a bit let down by the performance and was hoping the older formulation had better performance. For me it didn't. But it's a lovely refreshing fragrance. It is easy to wear on hot, humid, sticky days. The lemon is refreshing, the mint is cooling, the jasmine is light, watery and feminine. The brown sugar adds a slightly warm sweetness that keeps the fragrance from becomeing too astringent. I don't notice the cedar and labdanum on my skin.<br />
<br />
Acqua di Gioia is a casually feminine fragrance that is lovely to wear anytime. The jasmine leans more jasmine tea than overly floral, so this could be a work friendly fragrance. It is not loud and obnoxious so is a great choice when you want something unobtrusive that is fresh and clean.<br />
 <br />
The performance is on the low end of average for a freshie. I find it usually lasts 3-4 hours on skin and not much longer on clothes. I don't find a heavier application helps with longevity. It does help with projection, but only for a short time, about an hour. Overall the projection is pretty light. It stays withis arms reach for most of the wear. <br />
<br />
I don't think it's worth trying to track down an older bottle or paying a premium for one. The performance isn't noticeably better and I don't notice any difference in the scent. My bottle is from 2017 for reference, and I have had samples from the last couple years. Also the newer bottles are a little prettier. I like the rounder bottle and the polished gemstone looking top, much more than my more squared bottle and boring, round plastic cap. The atomizer is great on my bottle though. It's a pretty generous spray. which is needed for this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1871568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1871568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1870397" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1870397" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kylix"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1343206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kylix" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/La-Peau-Nue-57922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Peau Nue"title="La Peau Nue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1870397ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1870397" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343206">Kylix</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-03">07/03/23 13:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smell… melon in this. The note that is between melon and marine in perfumery. Mint is very artificial. It’s not a bad perfume, instead it’s summery sparkling, but too generic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1870397"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1870397#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1870071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1870071" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Adjr1087"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/987796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.987796.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Adjr1087" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Hypnotic-Poison-219.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.219.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Poison"title="Hypnotic Poison"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1870071ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1870071" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/987796">Adjr1087</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-03">07/03/23 05:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my easy reach for the hot, sticky summer weather. I prefer this over other "summer" musky fragrances that tend to make me nauseous. This is like a sip of a very refreshing drink when you feel like suffocating with extreme hot weather. I feel like we need more summer fragrances with mint, but also a balance between being too "lemony" and too sweet. This one is just a perfect balance between those 2 accords.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1870071"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1870071#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1654621">elinadinex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-03">07/03/23 00:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A hot summer day in the city before I was meeting up with some friends, I decided to buy this and "refresh myself". First I thought this was the perfect clean girl perfume but after I've been wearing this I think otherwise, I want to think I got a bad batch but after I let it sit it gives me nausea and the smell is anything but pleasant and especially if you overspray this, which you kinda have to because it disapears quickly. Want to love this but something about it is just off for me and the scent changes quickly from something amazing to something awful unfortunately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I wear this everyday!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1869361"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1869361#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1867558" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1867558"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1867558#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866047" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866047" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hpeeters"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712632.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hpeeters" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Brit-819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Brit"title="Burberry Brit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866047ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866047" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712632">hpeeters</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-27">06/27/23 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a lovely fresh and bright scent! I don’t really detect the mint, it blends well within the bottle. I definitely get the jasmine, I love jasmine scents. the lemon is not to bitter in this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1866047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1866047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1864752" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jenbug23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445798.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jenbug23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Le-Parfum-78427.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78427.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Le Parfum"title="Black Opium Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1864752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1864752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445798">Jenbug23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-26">06/26/23 05:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’ve had this for years and I’ve always loved it. I retired it for winter and just came back to it for summer and it’s much sweeter than I remember. The brown sugar note is much more forward and I’m loving it! Truly gets better with time .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1864752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1864752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1864281" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cheleine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1349744.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cheleine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Duelle-Eau-de-Toilette-9241.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9241.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"title="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1864281ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1864281" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349744">cheleine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-25">06/25/23 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was overlooking this for a long time. I’ve tried this on paper and the initial blast was too sweet for a summer fresh scent (what I was looking for at the time). Back then I was trying other perfumes as well and I completely forgot about it. Actually, I didn’t care for it until I’ve tried it again recently, on my skin, this time. <br />
The sweetness lasts for a few minutes only and then it just gets transformed into a seductive aquatic beauty. That dry down… absolutely stunning!<br />
It’s what I wished Cool Water would be. It has that dewy, after the summer rain in nature but also close to the sea kind of scent. Just a tiny bit salty. Natural and relaxing. <br />
I think this is inoffensive even if you overspray, has a pretty decent staying power and very good sillage and it is actually quite easy to like. Good to spray on when nothing else works for the heat of the mediterranean summer. A like (maybe love?) for me. 🩵</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1864281"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1864281#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is a luxurious and sophisticated scent, with a chic and young twist.<br />
The smell of a mojito on the beach.<br />
Works just as well in the evening and on cold days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1863439"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1863439#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1856753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677430">zenithince</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-15">06/15/23 04:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My signature scent that I don't share with anyone.It reminds me of calm sunny days and reflects the beauty of nature. I wear it confidently, perfect for summer outings, beaches and evenings. Refreshing, feminine, clean and chic. Beautiful bottle. Magical for night events. I love it!<br />
<br />
I fell in love with the strong, fresh aquatic nature. No sharp notes, no melon or lotus. Delicious and bright, like fresh cucumber with lemon. Fresh lemon, aquatic notes, a bit of cedar. Light and airy, perfect for the warmer months. Evokes the sea. Invigorating, energetic Joy Water. Long-lasting, medium sillage. Ideal for summer. One of the best citrus scents.  I've been wearing it for 5 years and I can't get enough of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1856753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1856753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639520">joikgirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-24">05/24/23 13:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been wanting to buy this fragrance for more than 10 years now. I first smelled it at my aunts place who also likes perfumes. Its a beautiful aromatic fragrance for spring and summertime. I love a good mint, it is one of my weaknesses in perfumes, same story with jasmine and this is a beautiful blend of both. Suitable for everyone, young and old, it is youthful and mature at the same time and would suit a man and a woman.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1840899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1840899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1840699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1840699" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ntabassum92"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/870644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.870644.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ntabassum92" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Eau-de-Parfum-53.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Eau de Parfum"title="Shalimar Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1840699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1840699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/870644">ntabassum92</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-24">05/24/23 07:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the first perfumes I remember having a sample of. I didn't understand the hype at first, as it came off too sharp on me and also much sweeter than I had expected a fresh perfume to be. I actually steered away from all ozonic perfumes because of this fragrance! But as I wore my sample, 9 years ago now, I slowly fell in love with the brown sugar, lemon, and mint combination. The lemon does kind of sear your nostrils a little, but in the same way salt can burn when it gets in your nose from ocean water.<br />
<br />
I have a full on love affair with mint now, so I'm so thankful to have a bottle of this mint-forward perfume. My mom was gifted a bottle and I stole it :D I don't smell the mint as herbal or peppermint, but it's more of a feeling, that super refreshing cooling feeling that mint gives a drink on a hot day. Wore it on a beach vacation last year and it was so perfect. Now it gives me all the memories of the seaside and also those early days when I first explored perfume. It has pretty moderate lasting power on me, I don't struggle with the performance as much as some other people do. I also get compliments on this perfume, so other people do smell it!<br />
<br />
Love Acqua di Gioia, nothing that smells quite like it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1840699"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1840699#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1838957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1838957" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rkivenamu7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754955"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rkivenamu7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1838957ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1838957" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754955">Rkivenamu7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-21">05/21/23 23:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have it and I love it, something fresh with I hint of sugar that I really like. The only bad aspect, it doesn't last too much on me, 2 hours maximum, too bad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1838957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1838957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1838517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1830031" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jazzscent13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1695061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1695061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jazzscent13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Si-Intense-2021-64853.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64853.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sì Intense 2021"title="Sì Intense 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1830031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1830031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1695061">jazzscent13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-10">05/10/23 22:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such an easy going fresh scent. It’s one of the few freshies on the market, that doesn’t smell like cleaning solution. The mint and brown sugar in this balances out the citrus notes, making it the perfect gender neutral smell. This has moderate longevity and projecting. I mainly use this for simple/casual days. This would make a great signature scent for anyone with a sensitive nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1830031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1830031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827766" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1827766" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="qinny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1693612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1693612.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="qinny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1827766ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1827766" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1693612">qinny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-08">05/08/23 09:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this for an everyday scent. So fresh and clean without smelling like a cleaning product. This would be perfect for hot summer days and/or in professional settings where you don't want to offend anyone with a strong scent but still wants to smell good. There's a tinge of sweetness from the brown sugar to cut through the aromatic elements so it doesn't go into "cologne" category. Really love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1827766"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1827766#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very fresh for summer staying power was for days the hair mist very lovely minty and lots of compliments. - wish they brought it back. THIS newer version with the light green Cap is not the same as the older version. This one is more light less minty and not lasting anymore. Its just different  :(.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1827604"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1827604#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827485" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1827485" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Poudery"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1300060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1300060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Poudery" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lanvin/Arpege-6.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Arpège"title="Arpège"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1827485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1827485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1300060">Poudery</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-08">05/08/23 00:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Acqua di Gioia lives up to its name - I recently bought it and have been wearing it in the changing spring weather we've had: from cool, to slightly warm, to early summer temperatures. It's simply very enjoyable, fresh, bright and...friendly! Not overwhelming, even if you're a heavy sprayer, stays soft and juicy. No sharpness, no headache inducing note.<br />
The mint and brown sugar notes remind me of a Mojito. An alltogether energetic vibe. Conjures up images of half shaded orchards and gardens for me, which help enhance the impression of a cooling effect.<br />
<br />
Lasts a couple of hours on my skin, longer on fabric and hair. Has a moderate sillage in the beginning and after a while stays closer to the body. Perfect day fragrance in spring and summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1827485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1827485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1825808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; On me it has such an annoying bitter note. I think I’m just repulsed by a synthetic almost metallic mint note. I tried Aqua Celestia by MFK and i had the same reaction to it, like something is off. I love mint in drinks and food but in these perfumes it’s not working for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1825808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1825808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1825765" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1825765" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GigiKay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/289293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.289293.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GigiKay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Wood-Sage-Sea-Salt-25529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wood Sage & Sea Salt"title="Wood Sage & Sea Salt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1825765ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1825765" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); Lovely and perfect. Light, bright and happy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1825765"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1825765#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822949" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1822949" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gory-rilmore"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1597590"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1597590.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gory-rilmore" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1822949ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1822949" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1597590">gory-rilmore</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-02">05/02/23 06:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The only reason I didn't try this sooner is I have some kind of prejudice against big brands like Armani. Like, I'm convinced they can't "get" me. This was foolish of me. Acqua di Gioia rules.<br />
<br />
This has the vibe of a summer day spent at the art museum followed by a mojito on a terrace. It's hard to find a fragrance that's sophisticated while also feeling so light and breezy. It's tasteful, pretty, classic without coming close to being grandma-esque. I feel like when someone catches a whiff of this, they want a little more. <br />
<br />
I feel like I'm going to run the travel size dry this summer and I'll be crawling back for the full size.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1822949"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1822949#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1821838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1821838" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ghadah02"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672597"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1672597.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ghadah02" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Liis/Floating-74127.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74127.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Floating"title="Floating"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1821838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1821838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); It's highly ADDICTIVE and smells expensive like a high-class fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1821838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1821838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1809503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I needed something fresh for work<br />

This perfume is only available ONLINE here in Australia at David jones stores<br />

fresh fresh aquatic lemoney minty 🌊🧊🍋🌱<br />
