padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1801506" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zvrkic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/328620"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.328620.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zvrkic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Opium-Parfum-33772.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33772.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opium Parfum"title="Opium Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1801506ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1801506" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/328620">zvrkic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-05">04/05/23 17:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What in world I was thinking when I purchase perfume with green bottle…<br />
I am looking for something I can wear on hot summer day so I blind bought it. It is wearable but it is not love on first sign. I miss some warmth. Someone said it is like mojito and I agree. Also I see this as perfume Thumbelina would wear while sitting on lotus. Husband said it remind him of his perfume Prada Luna Rossi</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1801506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1801506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1801131" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1801131" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AllisonNW"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1446255.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AllisonNW" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1801131ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1801131" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446255">AllisonNW</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-05">04/05/23 09:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am so excited that it’s starting to warm up in my area so I can wear this! The “main accords” graphic would make me think I wouldn’t like this one, yet the notes enticed me. Luckily I gave it a shot and it’s so good! My husband had such a huge positive reaction to this one, I was stunned! The cool mint with the refreshing citrus makes me bubble over with happiness, instantly lifting my mood. The jasmine here is so nice. It’s not heady or indolic. The base notes never become too prominent, but support the longevity and it stays a freshie for a long time! I’m thoroughly impressed. Versace Versense is my most treasured spring/summer easy reach freshie with great longevity, but this one is definitely a close second. Versense is green, figgy, and more of a floral focused fragrance to me. ADG is chilled, effervescent, citrus heaven.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1801131"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1801131#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1798276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1798276" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amg7613"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1505015"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amg7613" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-be-275.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.275.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK be"title="CK be"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1798276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1798276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1505015">amg7613</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-01">04/01/23 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn’t have high expectations but this perfume is a bop and a half!<br />
<br />
So, I decided to take advantage of Sephora’s half of Acqua Di Gioia today.  I did not plan on buying this, and I think I had smelled it once in 2012, but I didn’t remember disliking it - and summertime is coming up, so why not.  I went in and smelled it on a test strip in the store, thought whoopty do, but I had a gut feeling and went with it.<br />
<br />
It’s so fresh and crisp.  Lasts all day!  Several compliments.  The mint and lemon dry down into a soapy cedar, and holds on here for the rest of the day.  You will go nose blind and think it disappeared, but it didn’t.  It wafts around you like a Princess on the Amalfi Coast.  <br />
<br />
If you want to manifest all your dreams, wear this perfume.  The end!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1798276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1798276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1792029" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554949">clairescentience</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-25">03/25/23 00:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why is nobody talking about how this smells so effortlessly wealthy??? Like fanning money to your face? Where is the mention of the wood and leather?? And the mintiness is not the eucalyptus kind. It didnt read as menthol to me, more like uplifting and fresh! A beautiful scent for people who want a sophisticated scent that has elements of money, wood, and leather that doesn't smell like an Uncle or Auntie, and smells so LIGHT, AIRY, and refined!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1699691">JapanEnthusiast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-04">03/04/23 19:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hate the bottle so much! But the perfume smells amazing! This is another fragrance for those of us who like tasteful scents. If you like Chance eau tendre eau de parfum by Chanel or Jo Malone London English Pear &amp; Freesia cologne, you will probably like this. Fragrances with a lot of class and are more mature. Acqua di Gioa is an acquatic, Mediterranean perfume. It starts out soft but lasts throughout the day. I liked it so much I bought a gift set of Acqua di Gioa and it is up there in my most prized top favorite fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1775221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1775221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1770929" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1770929" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jessk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538853"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jessk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1770929ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1770929" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538853">Jessk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-27">02/27/23 17:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sprayed this into the air at Sephora just to see what it was. I would never have pegged myself to like anything “lemony-mint”, it’s totally not my scent profile as I don’t do unisex &amp; I’ve thought mint was a male-only direction. But this pleasantly surprised me, it was so fun &amp; nice, and maintained femininity. <br />
<br />
Smelling this, I was instantly transported to a Mediterranean beach (though I’ve never been to one- this is what I’d imagine it to smell like lol). I can definitely see why this is so popular. It’s quite an enticing freshie.<br />
<br />
Now I’m kicking myself for not spraying it on myself to test the dry-down. One day lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1770929"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1770929#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1769332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Just beautiful🥰</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1754833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1754833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1754302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1623448">GoodNose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-07">02/07/23 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this perfume after hearing many positive reviews and wanting to have a fresh scent in my humble collection.<br />
After sampling it in the store, I couldn't help but reach out to constantly smell the tester paper. <br />
From the first spray and fast-forward hours later, it's a very clean, citrusy and delicious scent. <br />
<br />
Definitely feel like I'm on holiday by the beach when I wear it. I can imagine it will smell incredible on a hot summer day. Love the hint of the mint note also - makes me feel like I've stepped out of a shower!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1754302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1754302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749796" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="peachnipz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1638980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1638980.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="peachnipz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Alien-707.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.707.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alien"title="Alien"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1638980">peachnipz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-02">02/02/23 09:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my signature scent. I've been wearing it ever since it was released. It was the first perfume that I really invested in (as a teenager, this felt like a real investment at the time). After wearing it for 10+ years, I have been curious about exploring other scents, which is how I found this website. I do enjoy trying on new scents and switching it up, but Acqua di Gioa will always hold a special place in my heart and I can't imagine another scent taking its place as #1. At some point, it became a part of my identity. It's super fresh and gorgeous. It's young and bright. Imagine having the best day at the beach, sipping mojitos with your besties, going home and taking a shower, and climbing into silk sheets. That's how it makes me feel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1749796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1749796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1746241" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1746241" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Obvious/Une-Pistache-84607.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84607.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Une Pistache"title="Une Pistache"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1746241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1746241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-28">01/28/23 18:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has always been a staple in my perfume collection. One of my favourite scents. Nowadays you can get a 50-ml bottle for only $50 which is a good price point for a quality designer fragrance. The combo of mint and lemon is perfectly divine and fresh, good to wear year-long although best for summer. The brown sugar is so well-blended I can’t smell it. I forgot how good the longevity was. I sprayed some at 3 pm and I can still smell it on my wrists at 2 am, 11 hours later.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1746241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1746241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1741476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1741476" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tilapia_johnson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504382"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tilapia_johnson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1741476ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1741476" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504382">tilapia_johnson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-23">01/23/23 12:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very simplistic but very wearable. Opening is a nothing-fancy, GMO lemon with only a hint of mint. The middle note of jasmine is a generic perfume-y smell, but quickly jumps to brown sugar and labdanum, which adds a grounding element that usually patchouli does in fragrance. Other reviewers say this smells like a mojito, but it smells more like a mojito that has spilled on one's sundress and dried in the sun. The longevity is very poor, but that is what could make this the perfect perfume for a person who doesn't like heavy or overly girly scents. It is fresh. clean, and light, better for warmer times.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1741476"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1741476#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1737954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1737954" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HillTop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007456"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1007456.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HillTop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/La-Petite-Robe-Noire-Intense-39157.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39157.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Petite Robe Noire Intense"title="La Petite Robe Noire Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1737954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1737954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007456">HillTop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-19">01/19/23 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is already said so much about this gorgeous fragrance. Minty fresh with the best vibes of jasmine you can imagine. Like a perfect fit of blue jeans - you feel confident, sporty, elegant. Nothing to add. Perfection in a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1737954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1737954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1735500" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1735500" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shui-Xian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1541621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shui-Xian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aemium/Nova-Espero-65691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nova Espero"title="Nova Espero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1735500ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1735500" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541621">Shui-Xian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-16">01/16/23 10:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very pleasant, clean and airy.<br />
 <br />
Proclamed  "harmony with nature" smells by drugstore synteticity, but it is balanced. <br />
Citruses very well combined with dewy flowers. Jasmine is just a gentle, elegant touch. <br />
Hard to say if this perfume is more green or flowery or fresh: every aspect suits. The base is not heavy but solid. <br />
<br />
I like it. Safe choice indeed.<br />
<br />
Moderate sillage and longevity (about 4-5 hours).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1735500"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1735500#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1732218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1732218" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="moonbird33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1650156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="moonbird33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1732218ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1732218" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650156">moonbird33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-12">01/12/23 09:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a blind buy, and I don't regret the purchase at all. It's sweet, pleasant, fresh, and light. The opening smells almost mojito-y. It's a very innocuous perfume and could be worn for many occasions. Nothing particularly memorable about it, but that's okay. Sometimes, you just want something simple.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1732218"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1732218#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1722566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722566" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="swetly.scented"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1650061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="swetly.scented" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722566ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722566" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650061">swetly.scented</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-01">01/01/23 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorites. It's a fresh fragrance but very rich and has this depth to it for sure. I imagine a nice, rich lady wearing it. Note: the opening is okay but the dry down is definitely what makes this fragrance unique. I highly recommend checking it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1722566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1722566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1720593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1720593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="milipudding"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/708193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.708193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="milipudding" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Eau-de-Rhubarbe-Ecarlate-35375.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35375.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Rhubarbe Ecarlate"title="Eau de Rhubarbe Ecarlate"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1720593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1720593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); At first very fresh and aquatic, then quickly becomes very fruity. Reminds me of Tommy girl, basic but preppy. I imagine a New England boarding school graduate would wear this when she goes to the Hamptons for a summer family gathering. A crowd pleaser. I probably won’t buy the full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1720593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1720593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1717054" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Serena007"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387104.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Serena007" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Good-Girl-39681.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39681.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Good Girl"title="Good Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1717054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1717054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387104">Serena007</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-25">12/25/22 10:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I adore this scent. In the beginning you get a beautiful burst of lemon and crisp mint. It dries down to a perfect balance between fresh and sweet, lasts on my skin all day. You can definitely smell the jasmine in this too. Works every season of the year and perfect for everyday wear. I notice myself getting hints of the fragrance all throughout the day, it's not an offensive scent - a crowd pleaser if you will. It's feminine and a safe blind-buy as well. Simply stunning. The name of the fragrance fits perfectly - water of joy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1717054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1717054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1710729" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1686409" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bea777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1515006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bea777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1686409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1686409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515006">bea777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-11">11/11/22 17:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my signature scent during summer, every time I wear this I receive so many compliments. My mother loves it, so much so that I'm debating buying her a bottle. Such an easy and intuitive reach when there's hot weather, it's truly the perfect fit. This scent is so juicy, fresh and slightly floral. Such a happy scent for me which holds so many good memories. I've made a significant dent in my 100ml bottle which is rare for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1686409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1686409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1685970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1685970" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thykes10"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1584485"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1584485.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thykes10" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Narciso-Eau-de-Parfum-Cristal-73075.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73075.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narciso Eau de Parfum Cristal"title="Narciso Eau de Parfum Cristal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1685970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1685970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1584485">Thykes10</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-11">11/11/22 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice refreshing citrus floral. I can easily pick out the citrus and jasmine. I can’t specifically pick out the mint but that must be what gives this a refreshing feel. It’s a very soft and pleasant scent but not a love for me. Doesn’t project strongly and lasted about 4 hours before becoming a skin scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1685970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1685970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1681128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1681128" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="procatstinating"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583666"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1583666.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="procatstinating" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1681128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1681128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583666">procatstinating</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-04">11/04/22 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really easy reach on a hot day. It's hard to go wrong with this one. It opens a bit shampooey on me, I wish the mint and cedar came through more. As time goes on it develops some complexity and loses some of that shampooey quality to become a very delicate and feminine aquatic floral. It doesn't have any of that bitterness or sour note that citric scents can sometimes take on, it's just smooth and refreshing. Smells like having a mojito by a fountain in a flower garden.<br />
Fantastic if you want to smell fresh and clean all day. It's pretty casual, I wouldn't recommend it for the night unless you're having a drink at a beach bar or something. <br />
I haven't tried yet, but I suspect it would lend itself nicely to layering with other scents to give them a fresher, more aquatic quality, or if you want to give this crowd pleaser the edge it doesn't have on its own, since it's not a statement scent by any means.<br />
If you simply want something pretty, soft, calming, delicate, go for it! If you want to stand out, give it a pass. All in all I'm happy to have it around!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1681128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1681128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1677722" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1677722" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oblyth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598464"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598464.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oblyth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Celeste-64788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Celeste"title="Celeste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1677722ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1677722" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); Nothing to complain about.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1677722"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1677722#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1677380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
It's not bad, but it's definitely dumbfounding.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1666291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1666291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1663755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1663755" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chimidoro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7591"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.7591.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chimidoro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Dolce-Gabbana-Pour-Femme-Intense-18837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme Intense"title="Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1663755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1663755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7591">chimidoro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-11">10/11/22 11:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So upset that I sold off my Essenza version and recently purchased this presuming it would be a softer, more easy going, possibly less woody version.<br />
I like this, but I'll never wear it. I really regret it and wish I'd stuck with the Essenza! <br />
<br />
Even so, I found the essenza base too sweet. <br />
I really ought to have taken the hint that this range ain't for me.<br />
<br />
I smell no mint (or jasmine) in the original. It's not at all what I hoped for.<br />
I have a 100ml bottle of the original and I'm not quite sure what to do with it because swapping would require communicating and providing my address. <br />
Not likely.<br />
I REALLY don't want to use eBay to sell because it now requires you to grant full access and control of your bank account. <br />
Never gonna happen.<br />
<br />
Such regret.<br />
<br />
Tried it on my best friend and, although he likes it, it didn't last on his skin, his skin "ate" it, so that's no use.<br />
It is strong and relatively long lasting on me but I don't like it at all. Not because it's no good, but because it's not for me.<br />
<br />
This is a review for the original formula. Anybody reviewing the latest/later versions is basically just writing about another scent.<br />
<br />
Too citric, woody, too sweet. 💗🤞</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1663755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1663755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1661786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1661786" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1661786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1661786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-08">10/08/22 12:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I used to have an old version with square oval one, I quite like it back then.<br />
But can't not afford to buy full bottle.<br />
<br />
Now during the journey, I rediscover this again with new bottle.<br />
As I need a fragrance with Jasmine accord (remind me of my mother).<br />
Then I discover that the Jasmine that I like is in this bottle as well.<br />
<br />
However, this version is a bit less coiling than last one.<br />
The scent is changed, Simplier and lighter a bit.<br />
<br />
Opening, I didn't quite get the mint but strong fizzy lemon.<br />
Before it turn to Jasmine along with other flower.<br />
The strong sugary tone is slow reveal stronger as time pass by.<br />
If their is cedar. It's extremely mild on skin.<br />
Somehow the Skin Scent turn sporty on me.<br />
<br />
for me this is extremely unisex (leans women a bit).<br />
It's in line with most Fresh Fragrance but this one just have White Floral &amp; Sweet tone.<br />
<br />
I personally like pervious version more a bit.<br />
As It's more strong than this one. but this is still not bad.<br />
[On skin 06-07 hours / On Cloth 10 hours]<br />
<br />
8/10 Dumb reach for hot day. :)<br />
=====<br />
Edit 1 - 13 December 2022<br />
<br />
I can see a lot of people rate this as Feminine frag.<br />
It has lustrously sweet undertone come from French labdanum and Brown sugar.<br />
With that, it is sweeter than most traditional male perfume.<br />
<br />
However, as the time progress, male fragrance become sweeter than it uses to be.<br />
It feel likes this is Borderline of Femme-Unisex quality.<br />
(I personally think Y by YSL is even sweeter than this)<br />
<br />
If you are a male I would say try it, it's good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1661786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1661786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1661602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1661602" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miyawakiri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521606"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1521606.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miyawakiri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1661602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1661602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1661602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1661602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1658740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1658740" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shannfernando"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1072211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1072211.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shannfernando" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Occitane-en-Provence/Eau-des-Baux-2034.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2034.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Baux"title="Eau des Baux"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1658740ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1658740" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1072211">shannfernando</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-04">10/04/22 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This review is for the older bottle:<br />
<br />
I so wanted to love this but, I couldn’t. I love tugs opening, so crisp, fresh and cooling. But when it starts to dry down something synthetic and overly sweet takes over and I cannot stand it. It ruins the perfume in all honesty.<br />
<br />
I much prefer Air Di Gioia to this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1658740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1658740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="8442" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>

I have been wearing it for about 3 years,  and can't get enough of it. Reminds me of an after rain smell on a summer day. It sounds very harmonious on my skin and surrounds me with the scent of the beauty of the nature around me. <br />
I feel very confident while wearing me. I love the way it smells on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="725893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=725893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749796" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="peachnipz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1638980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1638980.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="peachnipz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Alien-707.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.707.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alien"title="Alien"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1638980">peachnipz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-02">02/02/23 09:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my signature scent. I've been wearing it ever since it was released. It was the first perfume that I really invested in (as a teenager, this felt like a real investment at the time). After wearing it for 10+ years, I have been curious about exploring other scents, which is how I found this website. I do enjoy trying on new scents and switching it up, but Acqua di Gioa will always hold a special place in my heart and I can't imagine another scent taking its place as #1. At some point, it became a part of my identity. It's super fresh and gorgeous. It's young and bright. Imagine having the best day at the beach, sipping mojitos with your besties, going home and taking a shower, and climbing into silk sheets. That's how it makes me feel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1749796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1749796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1762864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The bottle is also beautiful. One of my favorites of all time. I know the votes lean towards day wear usage mostly, but a late night dinner date after swimming all day, damp hair, a beautiful dress, a fresh tan, hydrated skin, and I can see this perfume being magical during night time! So so so beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1762864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1762864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent960788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/109595">sarage</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-11">07/11/18 08:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's funny, I always knew without testing, that I would love Aqua Di Gioia. Today I finally tested it and fell in love with it's strong, fresh aquatic nature which has no stingy, sharp notes in it, no melon and no water lily (I am tired of those).<br />
<br />
My zodiac sign is Pisces. This could easily represent my sign.<br />
I almost see and hear the sea when wearing this.<br />
This scent has uplifting, energetic nature - it is truly Water of Joy.<br />
<br />
Longevity is great, sillage is moderate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="960788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=960788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1021231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1021231" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jenniferg0924"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170913"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170913.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jenniferg0924" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1021231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1021231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170913">jenniferg0924</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-16">01/16/19 11:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great, great scent for summer! <br />
<br />
One of the best citrus fragrances in my opinion.<br />
<br />
This is one of the scents i prefer in the high summer heat over D&amp;G Light Blue. Light Blue is so hyped and i don't think it's all that great.<br />
<br />
This is very zesty and bright. Honestly, to me, this smells like a fresh cucumber with lemon! I know that sounds weird but seriously to me that is how it smells. <br />
<br />
As far as notes, it's fresh lemon with aquatic notes and a little bit of cedar in the background. Pink pepper is one of my favorite notes in fragrances and unfortunately i don't smell any pink pepper in this. It's very light and airy. Again perfect for the high heat summer months.<br />
<br />
Scent: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Sillage:7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8442"comment_id="1021231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html?ccid=1021231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="8442" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
